response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its immense worth to you, I am confident it will be a valuable asset in achieving your business goals. I am offering this exceptional opportunity to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive a substantial return on your investment while also maximizing my earnings. Please let me know if you require any further information or clarification about the product, and we can schedule a detailed discussion to explore this exciting opportunity together.", "product_price": 1200000}
